name: ThePeriodicTableQuiz
0:
”Alexa open the Periodic Table Quiz”
”Alexa tell the Periodic Table Quiz to Start the game”
”Repeat the question”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the periodic table quiz
des:
The Periodic Table Quiz lets you test your knowledge of the periodic table in an interactive way. Each quiz consists of ten questions, such as "What element is represented by the symbol, 'He'?". You then give your answers by saying the name of the element, in this case "Helium".

The Periodic Table Quiz is aimed at students that need to practice the the periodic table. The quiz has been programmed from scratch by Software Engineer Geoff Hayward https://www.geoffhayward.eu with the goal of creating an enjoyable experience. The quiz has been well tested in order to maximise your enjoyment and learning. 

Once you enabled The Periodic Table Quiz on your Alexa device, say "Alexa, start The Periodic Table Quiz". Answer each question out loud, just saying what you think the answer is. If you need to hear the question again, you can ask the quiz to "repeat the question". If you have no idea what the answer is, just say "pass", "skip" or "sausages".

The Periodic Table Quiz does not collect personal details. The Periodic Table Quiz does not include advertising. The quiz does promote the capabilities of Geoff Hayward (the quiz’s author). 

Please send issue reports, ideas for improvements and question suggestions using the contact form at https://www.geoffhayward.eu/message. 

Thanks you for reading this description. Enjoy The Periodic Table Quiz.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
